item.title: 穆迪将泰晤士水务公司评级最高的债券降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 在英国水务监管机构将泰晤士水务公司置于所谓的 "周转监督机制 "之下后，穆迪评级公司将该公司的 A 级债务降至垃圾级。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lowered Thames Water’s class A debt to junk after the UK’s water regulator placed the company under a so-called turnaround oversight regime.】

item.title: 阿根廷的页岩雄心终将实现
item.description:
由于急需基础设施的建设，瓦卡穆埃尔塔地区的发展势头日益强劲。【原文：

There’s growing momentum in the Vaca Muerta thanks to the build-out of much-needed infrastructure.

】

item.title: 肯尼亚基础设施债券销售目标为 500 亿先令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，肯尼亚计划在下个月通过出售额外的基础设施债券来筹集 500 亿先令（约合 3.77 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Kenya plans to raise 50 billion shillings ($377 million) by selling additional infrastructure bonds next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度或将调整规则以遏制热流进入债券指数
item.description: 印度财政部一位高级官员表示，如果大量资金流入刺激了市场波动，印度可能会修改发行有资格在全球指数上交易的新债券的规则。【原文：India may amend rules for the issuance of new bonds that are eligible to trade on global indexes if large inflows spur volatility, according to a top finance ministry official.】

item.title: 印度政府计划稳步降低负债率至 50
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，印度政府计划在未来几年内将债务占国内生产总值的比例降至 50%左右，并维持在这一水平上下。【原文：India’s government plans to reduce its debt ratio to about 50% of gross domestic product over the coming years and sustain it around that level, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 您的一杯咖啡已经很贵了。现在情况更糟
item.description:
随着咖啡豆成本的飙升，世界各地的咖啡店为防止新一轮的涨价而厉行节约，但已无计可施。【原文：

Coffee shops around the world, pinching pennies to prevent another round of hikes, are running out of options as bean costs spike.

】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率降至 2 月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周回落至 2 月初以来的最低水平，而购房申请的进一步减少表明，可能需要更低的借贷成本来刺激需求。【原文：US mortgage rates eased last week to their lowest level since early February, while a further decline in home-purchase applications suggested even cheaper borrowing costs may be needed to stir demand.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在美国和欧洲股市乏善可陈之后，股市有望低开。Crowdstrike发现了导致上周IT崩溃的漏洞。德国经济萎缩导致欧元区经济活动停滞。以下是您需要了解的信息。【原文：Good morning. Stocks are poised to open lower after lackluster earnings in the US and in Europe. Crowdstrike has identified a bug which caused last week’s IT meltdown. And eurozone economic activity has ground to a halt thanks to a German contraction. Here’s what you need to know. — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 赞比亚银行行长淡化 "狂热 "的非美元化计划
item.description: 赞比亚央行仍在就限制在国内交易中使用外币的计划进行磋商，央行行长丹尼-卡利亚亚（Denny Kalyalya）斥责了公开质疑这些建议的 "狂热 "批评者。【原文：Zambia’s central bank is still consulting over plans to curb the use of foreign currency in domestic transactions, with Governor Denny Kalyalya calling out a “frenzy” of critics publicly questioning the proposals.】

item.title: 俄罗斯装载第四艘被制裁的 Sovcomflot 油轮以示对西方国家的蔑视
item.description: 俄罗斯装载了国营 Sovcomflot PJSC 拥有的第四艘受制裁油轮，考验着七国集团的决心，他们正试图钳制运输莫斯科石油的船队。【原文：Russia loaded a fourth sanctioned tanker owned by state-run Sovcomflot PJSC, testing the resolve of Group of Seven nations who’re attempting to clamp down on the fleet of ships moving Moscow’s oil.】

item.title: 研究显示，非洲蕴藏着 1930 亿美元的可再生能源机遇
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，到 2031 年，撒哈拉以南非洲将有 1930 亿美元的机会投资于可再生能源和输电领域，其回报率是欧洲和美国的数倍。【原文：Sub-Saharan Africa offers a $193 billion opportunity to invest in renewable energy and transmission by 2031, with returns a multiple of those in Europe and the US, according to a new study.】

item.title: 印度称计划在未来几个月内简化商品及服务税税率制度
item.description: 印度一位高级税务官员表示，印度正在努力简化本国的销售税制度，引入三档税率，而不是现有的四档税率。【原文：India is working on simplifying the country’s sales tax regime by introducing three slabs instead of the existing four rates, a top tax official said.】

item.title: 瑞银称，瑞士联合银行丰厚利润将使派息希望永存
item.description: 瑞士联合银行（UBS）的经济学家们估计，瑞士国家银行上半年将取得丰厚的收益，从而更有可能在 2024 年向政府支付款项，此前该央行已连续两年暂停支付款项。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is set for bumper first-half earnings, making a payout to the government for 2024 more likely, economists at UBS estimate after the central bank suspended payments two years in a row.】

item.title: 冰岛通胀创四个月新高，降息押注降温
item.description: 冰岛的通货膨胀率加速上升，达到四个月来的最快速度，从而降低了岛国中央银行开始放松西欧最激进货币政策的可能性。【原文：Iceland’s inflation accelerated to its fastest pace in four months, reducing the odds that the island nation’s central bank would begin to ease western Europe’s most aggressive monetary stance.】

item.title: 德国莱茵金属公司因国防开支激增而盈利翻倍以上
item.description: 德国最大的军火制造商莱茵金属股份公司第二季度利润飙升 111%，因为该公司向军方客户出售了更多的武器和弹药。【原文：Rheinmetall AG’s profit soared 111% in the second quarter as Germany’s biggest arms maker sold more weapons and ammunition to military clients.】

item.title: 债券牛市称印度预算谨慎为更多资金流入带来希望
item.description: 尽管印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的联合政府的第一份预算最初受到了市场的冷遇，但印度的债务仍将是亚洲新兴市场投资者的宠儿。【原文：India’s debt is set to stay the darling of investors in emerging Asia even after the first budget of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s coalition government initially received a cool reception by the market.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行预留 2.28 亿欧元与俄罗斯资产被扣押有关的款项
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 在接受采访时表示，该行 "审慎地预留了 "2.28 亿欧元（2.47 亿美元）资金，以应对俄罗斯法院扣押该国资产的决定。【原文：UniCredit SpA “prudentially set aside” €228 million ($247 million) of funds related to the decision by a Russian court to seize assets in the country, Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said in an interview.】

item.title: 韦丹塔寻求合作伙伴开发赞比亚矿山 它正在重获新生
item.description: 亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）创建的矿业公司韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）正在寻找商业合作伙伴，以提高其在多年法律诉讼后重新获得控制权的赞比亚铜矿资产的产量。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd., the mining company that billionaire Anil Agarwal founded, is looking for business partners to boost output at the Zambian copper assets it’s regaining control of after years of legal battles.】

item.title: 工党赢得大选后，英国商业信心和订单增长
item.description: 工党在大选中取得压倒性胜利后，英国私营企业的信心、招聘和新订单都出现了激增，这表明新政府可能会迎来更强劲的增长。【原文：Britain’s private sector companies reported a surge in confidence, hiring and new orders after Labour’s landslide election victory, a sign the new government may enjoy stronger growth.】

item.title: 食品和运输成本下降，南非通胀放缓
item.description: 南非的通胀率在 6 月份略有放缓，触及 6 个月来的最低点，这有可能促使央行考虑在今年晚些时候降息。【原文：South Africa’s inflation rate slowed slightly in June, touching a six-month low and potentially encouraging the central bank to consider cutting interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 德国经济意外下滑，欧元区经济活动陷入停滞
item.description: 由于欧元区第一大经济体意外下滑，本月欧元区私营部门活动几乎没有增长。【原文：Euro-area private-sector activity barely grew this month as its top economy unexpectedly slumped.】

item.title: 瑞典 Alecta 公司亏损 32 亿美元后可能面临制裁
item.description: 瑞典养老基金卷入了去年的美国银行业危机，面临着因投资失误导致 32 亿美元损失和减记而可能受到制裁的风险。【原文：The Swedish pension fund embroiled in last year’s US banking crisis runs the risk of possible sanctions over the investment missteps that led to $3.2 billion in losses and writedowns.】

item.title: 新西兰央行有望降息，收益率曲线陡峭化以结束倒挂状态
item.description: 随着新西兰央行越来越接近降息，新西兰的关键收益率曲线结束了倒挂。【原文：New Zealand’s key yield curve ended inversion as the nation’s central bank edged closer to cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 尼泊尔十八个月来最严重车祸造成至少 15 人死亡
item.description: 据当地警方称，Saurya 航空公司的一架航班在尼泊尔加德满都机场起飞时坠毁，造成 15 人死亡。【原文：A Saurya Airlines flight crashed during takeoff from Kathmandu Airport in Nepal, killing 15 people, according to local police.】

item.title: 德国工厂推动私营部门意外下滑
item.description: 由于德国制造业萎靡不振的状况进一步恶化，德国私营部门在 7 月份意外萎缩；这破坏了下半年经济增长回升的希望。【原文：Germany’s private sector unexpectedly contracted in July as country’s manufacturing malaise worsened — undermining hopes that growth will pick up in the second half of the year.】

item.title: 摩根大通称印度需要出售资产支持支出
item.description: 据一位顶级经济学家称，印度政府需要重启资产货币化计划，以创造税收以外的收入来源，这有助于为支出提供资金，同时保持财政稳健。【原文：India’s government needs to revive its asset monetization program to create revenue streams beyond taxes, which can help fund spending while keeping it on a fiscally prudent path, according to a top economist.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在大量财报和大型科技股的冲击下下滑
item.description: 欧洲股市下跌，原因是投资者忙于应对财报，并权衡美国科技巨头业绩的影响。【原文：European stocks declined as investors tackled a rush of earnings and weighed the impact of results from US technology megacaps.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行归还沙特 50 亿美元存款
item.description: 土耳其中央银行周三表示，已与沙特阿拉伯达成协议，终止去年与沙特进行的一笔 50 亿美元的存款交易。【原文：Turkey’s central bank said on Wednesday that it agreed with Saudi Arabia to terminate a $5 billion deposit transaction made with the kingdom last year.】

item.title: 韩国修订《反贪污法》，提高餐费限额
item.description: 韩国反贪局周二表示，韩国将八年来首次提高公职人员的餐费上限，以更好地反映近期的通胀压力。【原文：South Korea will raise the cap on meal expenses for public officials for the first time in eight years to better reflect the recent inflationary pressures, the anti-graft agency said Tuesday.】

item.title: 易捷航空夏季票价保持稳定，预订量持续增长
item.description: 易捷航空（EasyJet Plc）表示，机票价格在关键的暑期期间保持稳定，这与折扣竞争对手瑞安航空（Ryanair Holdings Plc）的前景形成了鲜明对比，后者本周警告称机票价格将明显下降。【原文：EasyJet Plc said airline ticket prices are holding up during the crucial summer period, providing a contrasting outlook to discount rival Ryanair Holdings Plc, which warned this week of a notable decline in airfares.】
